name: Missing stateCode in the request body.

testSteps.description:
Given Mathew has a list of vehicles to be Compared:
| code | llpCode |
| IUT201813DS6L62B | 2TB |
| CUD201811WDEL75A | 2TA |
When The user makes a post request to the Configuration-Service

children.description: Mathew executes a POST on the resource /configuration-compare/compare

testSteps.description: Then Should get a 400 response with the Error Message.

userStory.storyName: Gives Appropriate error messages for Request Failures
userStory.narrative: The Service will provide enough Messages and indication of the Failure of the Request to the User.
